title: Thank you so much Riot :) But
body:
Thank you Riot of my free Atlantean Syndra skin {{champion:134}}  :))) But she a champion i never play :'(  
If you do dish out anymore free skins :) i would love a Malzahar skin :) 
I will make sure to keep my clean and positive behaviour up :)
{{champion:90}}

replies.body: it was a random skin... dont ask for rito to do something special for your, just cause you 'deserve' it, be happy like i am with my lordekaiser skin even though i dont play him much
